title: Kanave Kanave Lyrics Sketch
stanzas:
kanave kanave  pudhu kanave
vizhikkum podhum varum kanave
manam paravai polave
siragai viriththu parakkuthe

thaniye thaniye tholaigirene
tholaivil thooral vizhugirathe
manam nanaya nanaya thondruthe
thuli vilagi poguthe.

unnaithaane naanum
paarththe karaindhaene
kaekkaamal kaalgal
undhan pinnae selgirathe

meithaano poithaano
ennai naane kaettene.
hey penne adi penne
enna vasiyam seithaayo...

en kannukulla unna
vachchathaala
immaikkaama
kaathirunthaen naan
en nenjukulla unn
vachchu thiththaen
thikki mukki
thindaaaduren naan. (2)

[podaathe kadhal gate-u
weight aagum endhan heartu
cute-ah nee paarkkum podhu
gaanaa podu

strawberry kanna paarthu
soodaachu moochu kaaththu.
nenjoram yello riceu
kaanaam poche. ] (2)

kanave kanave  pudhu kanave
vizhikkum podhum varum kanave
manam paravai polave
siragai viriththu parakkuthe

thaniye thaniye tholaigirene
tholaivil thooral vizhugirathe
manam nanaya nanaya thondruthe
thuli vilagi poguthe.

paarvaiyaale vendraval
vaarthaiyaale kondraval
neeyaa? neeyaa ?

en kannukulla unna
vachchathaala
immaikkaama
kaathirunthaen naan
en nenjukulla unn
vachchu thiththaen
thikki mukki
thindaaaduren naan. (2)

[podaathe kadhal gate-u
weight aagum endhan heartu
cute-ah nee paarkkum podhu
gaanaa podu

strawberry kanna paarthu
soodaachu moochu kaaththu.
nenjoram yello riceu
kaanaam poche. ] (2)

kanave kanave  pudhu kanave
vizhikkum podhum varum kanave
manam paravai polave
siragai viriththu parakkuthe
